sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.TimeSpanScheduler</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>TimeSpanScheduler</name> <script><![CDATA[var TimeSpanScheduler = Class.create();
TimeSpanScheduler.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { ajaxFunction_scheduleTime: function() { return new ScheduleTimeSpan().getRepeatDescription( this.getParameter('sysparm_repeat_type'), this.getParameter('sysparm_repeat_count'), this.getParameter('sysparm_start_date'), this.getParameter('sysparm_days_of_week'), this.getParameter('sysparm_monthly_type'), this.getParameter('sysparm_yearly_type'), this.getParameter('sysparm_month'), this.getParameter('sysparm_float_week'), this.getParameter('sysparm_float_day'), this.getParameter('sysparm_schedule_tz')); },
ajaxFunction_scheduleDateTime: function() { var sdt = new ScheduleDateTime(this.getParameter('sysparm_dt_tm')); if (this.getParameter('sysparm_include_z_format') == 'false') sdt.setIncludeZFormat(false); return sdt.convertTimeZone(this.getParameter('sysparm_current_timezone'),this.getParameter('sysparm_new_timezone')); }, });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>juell.solaegui</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2009-11-17 18:54:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>03797c8b0a0a0b0c0074cd281ca50233</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>TimeSpanScheduler</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Advanced Schedules Support" source="com.glide.schedules">fe467ca03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f72</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_03797c8b0a0a0b0c0074cd281ca50233</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-02-12 23:48:51</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
